citations.narrative:
Records for animals at hand containing required information on acquisition, addition and/or disposition of these,
were not available for inspection. There were no records or information on the recent acquisition of one juvenile
serval. The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose information
on purchased or otherwise acquired animals, and that are in his or her possession/control. The Record of Animals
on Hand (APHIS Form 7019) and Record of Acquisition, Disposition, or Transport of Animals (APHIS Form 7020)
are forms which may be used by the licensee to keep and maintain the information required by federal regulations.
The licensee needs to obtain/document the required information on all recently acquired animals as soon as
possible.
Correct by: November 7, 2015
Exit interview conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
2.75(b)(2)
RECORDS: DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS.
Records for animals at hand containing required information on acquisition, addition and/or disposition of these,
were not available for inspection.  There were no records or information on the recent acquisition of one juvenile
serval.  The licensee shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose information
on purchased or otherwise acquired animals, and that are in his or her possession/control.  The Record of Animals
on Hand (APHIS Form 7019) and Record of Acquisition, Disposition, or Transport of Animals (APHIS Form 7020)
are forms which may be used by the licensee to keep and maintain the information required by federal regulations. 
The licensee needs to obtain/document the required information on all recently acquired animals as soon as
possible.
Correct by: November 7, 2015
Exit interview conducted with a facility representative.
